title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view
2. Attempt to select any item

Expected Behavior: The selected item should be successfully selected in the library outline view.

Actual Behavior: The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view, and the selected item cannot be selected.
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus is unexpectedly jumping to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: The selected item should be successfully selected in the library outline view.
SR: Investigate the issue causing the focus to jump to the library file node and fix it so that the intended item can be successfully selected in the library outline view.
